CHAT.comment: MOT asks Chi if she would remembers the story of The Very Hungry Caterpillar. Chi does not seem to remember much , but does not take the time to re-read it. Chi begins writing the letter when Mot leaves to answer the phone. EXP helps Chi write the author's first name , and Mot returns to help Chi with the rest. Chi writes only one sentence and decides that is all she would like to write. Mot jokes that Chi's letter is the shortest one she has ever read before.

u.a: refers to where on the line paper Chi should write dear
MOT on the telephone in the background for the next twenty-six seconds
aft Mot hangs up phone and comes back to where EXP and Chi are
Chi starts writing her first name
